docs.lead_paragraph: The Charleston Standard suggests a novel explanation of the more rapid progress made in population and improvement at the North than at the South. According to the Standard, the rapid progress of wealth and improvement in the North is owning in a great degree to foreign immigration,

docs.lead_paragraph: ACADEMY OF MUSIC.-- The Lagrange troupe will repeat VERDI'S "Ernani" to night. We cordially conformed. he performance to the attention of the musical public. WALLACK'S THEATRE.--The excellent comedy of "Old Heads and Young Hearts" will be performed to night, together with the favorite force of the "Windmill."

docs.lead_paragraph: The Brooklyn Counterfeiters. JOHN LOSANO, his wife MARIA and JOHN QUIN, arrested in Brooklyn for counterfeiting United States coin, were on Saturday taken to New-York by officers MATHEWS and VAN WAGNER and placed in charge of the United States Marshal. The officers have obtained further evidence against one of the accused--JOHN QUIN.

headline.main: LAW INTELLIGENCE.; SUPREME COURT--SPECIAL TERM SUPREME COURT COURT CALENDAR The Schuyler Over-Issues. Important Will Case--The Estate of the Late Benjamin Romaine--Decision of Judge Hoffman. The Chemical Bank Forgery Case-Trial of Lyman Cole.

docs.lead_paragraph: UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT, SUPREME, SUPERIOR AND COMMON PLEAS--Motions and decisions. ??There were no trial terms held in the Superior Court yesterday. All the Judges sat at General Term, to hear the argument in the case of the Mechanics' Bank vs. the new-York and New-Haven Railroad Company.

headline.main: NEW-YORK CITY.; The New Building of the Chambers-street Savings Bank. Take your Fans, Ladies. A Runner Shot--Quarantine Must be Observed. Meeting of the Veterans of 1812. The K. N. Trouble in the Tenth Ward. Excitement at the Esses Court--Detection of "Straw" Bail. The Gang of Burglars and Bank-Robbers.. Drowned.

docs.lead_paragraph: We stated on Thursday that the Health Officer had been overhauling the land sharks. The following particulars of a decided overhauling by a ,mate ought to teach modesty to the amiable runners. The ship Mercury, Captain FRENCH from Havre, having four hundred and sixty-two emigrant ,passengers on board, arrived at Quarantine on the 22d inst. d inst. After being cleared by the Health Officer,

headline.main: NEW-YORK CITY.; Raising the Joseph Walker. Teachers' Association. Killed on a Railroad. Run-Over and Killed. Fire in Fifteenth-Street. The Fourth-avenue Railroad Accident. Art Gossip. Worth Looking After. Wouldn't Let the Chief have a Ride. Police Physicians. The Police Review. !Installation. Justice at the Tombs. More Arrests for Slave Trading. The Uses of Adversity. Fire Marshal's Office. The Captain of the Grapeshot and the Police Officers. Board of Councilmen.

docs.lead_paragraph: STATE DEPARTMENT. Amount of Wool Grown in Cape Colony and Australia.-From reliable data received at this Department, it appears that the quantity of Wool furnished by the Cape of Good Hope Colony from 1640 to 1852, inclusive, was 45,859,748 pounds; furnished by Australia during the same lime, 256,008.415 pounds; furnished by the Cape Colony during the year 1852, 7,773,505 pounds; furnihed by Australia during the same year, 32,500.000.
